disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Lightslinger.

blurb.value: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

description.value: Innate: After using an ability, Lucian's next basic attack within 3.5 seconds shoots an additional shot after a short delay, which deals 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions.

description2.value: The second shot applies on-hits and on-attack effects at full effect and is affected by critical strike modifiers.

description3.value: If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.

description4.value: Lightslinger is not consumed and does not trigger the second basic attack if Lucian is silenced.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Lightslinger is triggered and consumed by the first attack. The second attack, if the initial target was killed, will prioritize enemy champions regardless of having sight of them or not and enemy minions with  low health. Lightslinger will still be consumed if no second target is found when Lucian fires. Lucian can move freely while firing Lightslinger since the second attack is integrated into the first one and has special movement animations depending on the direction he is moving while firing.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Piercing Light.

target range.value: 500

effect radius.value: 1000

width.value: 120

blurb.value: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

description.value: Active: Lucian fires a laser in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit in a line.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* Piercing Light will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).
 Piercing Light's casts from the location Lucian was at at the start of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Ardent Blaze.

target range.value: 900

width.value: 110 / X / X

blurb.value: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

description.value: Active: Lucian fires a shot in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path, dealing magic damage and revealing the area for 1 second.

description2.value: Enemies hit are marked for 6 seconds.

description3.value: Lucian gains  bonus movement speed for 1 second if he or allied champions damage a marked target.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Ardent Blaze's initial shot fires towards targeted location from Lucian's location at the end of the cast time. Like most missiles, it will not collide with enemies whose center is beyond the maximum range (not behind Lucian), but this determines only the center and timing of the explosion. Ardent Blaze will cast from wherever Lucian is at the end of the cast time. Lucian will not gain Ardent Blaze's bonus movement speed if attacks on marked targets are dodged, blocked, or if missed while the attacker is blinded. DoTs will proc Ardent Blaze only once. Spell shield will not prevent the mark.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Relentless Pursuit.

blurb.value: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

description.value: Passive: Relentless Pursuit's  cooldown is reduced by 1 second for each Lightslinger shot landed, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.

description2.value: Active: Lucian dashes in the target direction.

description3.value: Relentless Pursuit resets Lucian's basic attack timer.

description4.value: Relentless Pursuit can be cast during The Culling and other abilities can be cast during Relentless Pursuit.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Additional on-hits during Lightslinger are not considered for the cooldown reduction (i.e Runaan's Hurricane, Guinsoo's Rageblade). Unlike some dashes, Lucian's dash speed does not scale with his movement speed.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from The Culling.

target range.value: 1200 (with offset)

width.value: 220 (with offset)

blurb.value: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

description.value: Active: Lucian rapidly fires shots in the target direction for 3 seconds, dealing physical damage to the first enemy they collide with. The damage is doubled against enemy minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds.

description2.value: While using The Culling, Lucian always faces in the casted direction and is ghosted, and he fires the shots in the target direction from his current position.

description3.value: Recast: Lucian ends The Culling early.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Lucian can interact with Dark Passage or Devour without interrupting The Culling. The Culling creates the shots at an offset of 35 units to the front plus 35 units towards each side of Lucian (sides alternating), instead of at his center, like most skillshot (missile) abilities. Even though each bullet can only hit one target, it will not proc Muramana since The Culling applies spell effects as persistent area damage. The damage dealt by each bullet of The Culling is calculated when the bullet reaches a target, just like single missile abilities. Spell shield only blocks one instance of damage. The following table refers for interactions while Lucian is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Relentless Pursuit is usable. Piercing Light and Ardent Blaze are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel. Movement Allowed Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled N/A Interrupted by Stopwatch Zhonya's Hourglass Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Disabled Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
